relatedRecords.name: Global Azure Atlanta 2020
relatedRecords.description: The annual Global Azure (formerly Global Azure Bootcamp) event will return to the greater metro-Atlanta area for the 6th year! The Global Azure event is a free one-day mini-conference, taking place on April 23-25 2020 in venues across the world, driven by Microsoft Azure experts and community enthus…

relatedRecords.name: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference
relatedRecords.description: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference is a polyglot event, designed to bring together programmers from the region, regardless of their choice of platform, for two full days of learning from each other and building a stronger regional community.

relatedRecords.name: #PerfMatters Conference
relatedRecords.description: A two-day community Web Performance conference happening March 31 & April 1, 2020 in Redwood City, CA. Workhops on March 30, 2020 to help get people up to speed on Web Performance. Hackathon on April 2, 2020 to improve online performance documentation.
